name: Stock Advisor
product_description: Introduction to TMFâ€™s investing philosophy, backed by monthly stock recommendations, our top ETFs, and core financial planning guidance.
product_what_is: Stock Advisor provides a wide range of stock research and recommendations. The service does not focus on a single area of the market, but rather looks anywhere for companies with potential to beat the market over the next five years and beyond. New recommendations are released every first and third Thursday of each month.

name: Rule Breakers
product_description: We believe the greatest investments of our time are companies that we call "Rule Breakers," because they break the rules of the business status quo. Rule Breakers bring a disruptive technology, diabolically clever marketing, or a totally new business model into the world, and they rattle our capitalistic foundations! In so doing, they can create serious profits for the opportunistic investors who find them early on.
product_what_is: Rule Breakers invests in technology-influenced businesses whose disruptive innovations can subvert industries and unleash multi-bagger returns.
